content: [{"id":"nnvMTG5Sl5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🌐Website Manual","col":12}},{"id":"B-CtTCmVDX","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The website module manages and configures a public facing website for the church using data from other modules (i.e. Foundations, Missions, Ministries, etc).","col":12}},{"id":"8qBfIl0adi","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Various information in the system (i.e. Beliefs, Missionaries, Ministries, etc), may be used to populate the public facing website.","col":12}},{"id":"kHbqzTGDhX","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The website 'feature' has not been fully developed but is on the roadmap.","col":12}}]
label: Manual: Website
name: Manual: Website
title: Manual: Website
